review_text: This is a great air bnb. It is its own little oasis. Peaceful setting. Great place to come back to after a day cycling or hiking. We will be back

After the long flight from Nice France and long drive from Washington DC to this very private Airbnb, everything seemed perfect! Hosts are very friendly and the Airbnb has everything that would be needed for a nice visit to the Brevard area. Thank you for your awesome hospitality!
Mark and Tressa

Such a perfect place! Has everything you need. The little house is immaculately kept and lots of little extras are provided. Lush, beautiful garden, very pretty and peaceful. Great value for your money. We’ll definitely be back!

I think this is perhaps the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. It was a beautiful garden and my dog was most welcome. The hosts were friendly and helpful. We had plans to visit friends but they were more than happy to make recommendations if needed.
The bed was soooo comfy. We will definitely be back!

Missy and Chris were great hosts. The place is very nice. I already miss the porch and garden. Great location close to town, breweries, Pisgah National Forrest and the Davidson River. Great place to stay highly recommended.
She went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable and felt welcomed! Best Airbnb I've ever stayed at. She is so sweet and genuinely wants to make sure you have a 5 star stay.
Wonderful hosts and location! Really enjoyed my stay:)

Missy & Chris were exceptional hosts and their apartment was absolutely incredible. The apartment is located on their beautiful property that truly felt like something out of a fairy tale. The apartment itself was very cozy and had so many special touches. The location was a perfect homebase for our Mountain Bike vacation - located super close to the Pisgah Ranger District as well as close to many restaurants and the grocery store. Missy and Chris provided so many helpful suggestions of places to eat and things to do. Based on their recommendation we rode our bikes to Oskar Blues one night for beer and dinner! When we had a mechanical issue on one of our bikes, Missy and Chris were so gracious and lent us their bike pump as well as an offer to use any tools we may have needed. We would recommend staying with Missy and Chris to anyone looking to have an amazing time in Brevard.

Super convenient and quaint studio super close to the heart of DT Brevard. The space was as described—quiet, clean, spacious, and comfortable. You can tell the hosts take pride in their place. Would absolutely recommend to anyone visiting Brevard.

I visited with my husband and dog for a quick mountain biking trip. This place was perfect! I worked remotely all week and it had reliable wifi and comfortable outdoor spaces. I could walk to a nice dog park and it's right on the path to get to a ton of different restaurants. It was well stocked with everything we could have needed and sweet extras!
We come top Brevard a couple times a year and we'll 100% be checking Missy's place first for availability in the future.

We had the perfect weekend getaway staying here! We were able to enjoy the waterfall hikes of Dupont. Went to Victoria's vineyard and got to our favorites in Asheville. The accommodations were peaceful, incredibly clean and comfortable. Could not have asked for better hosts. Missy and Chris are great!
My husband and I stayed here for one night. The property is absolutely beautiful. The studio is comfortable and very well stocked. Missy was very kind and generous. Would absolutely recommend.
The host is very friendly, there is lots to do in the surrounding area, and the place was very neat and clean! I would definitely recommend staying here!!!

First and foremost the house was squeaky clean, all that we needed was there and at the same time free of unnecessary clutter! We enjoyed our visit to Brevard NC and visited seven waterfalls over two days. My wife and I talked continously about how nice the house and location to town was. in short it was way beyond our expectations and the decorations were so very well done and kept us marveling at every turn....
Perfect house for family of 4 plus in-laws to spend a long weekend in Brevard. Interesting home with room for everyone and great access to all Brevard has to offer. Thanks!

The house is simply beautiful and cozy, it is just as you see it in pictures and the neighborhood is super quite and nice. Brevard was such a joy and you can drive to the blue ridge mountains and Asheville. Geraldine is super kind and will reply quick if you need anything. Will definitely recommend it for anyone. I will come back for sure.
Great location and a nice contemporary setting. Very spacious, and nice porch for the good weather. I’d stay there again, for sure!
The house was clean, really well done and the owner was super nice!
Quality accommodations and a great location! Geraldine is very response to any needs/requests. Highly recommend this place.
Unique, modern house in a great location close to town and mountain activities. Plenty of room for our family to spread out and relax.
A true hidden gem - super modern yet absolutely cozy - perfection
Super cute, modern space in a great location. Easy communication with the host. Would definitely stay here again.

Attended s workshop at the Brevard Music Center. This is a five minute drive from the center. This is also walkable to downtown shops and restaurants. It's a beautiful neighborhood. Susie's house is well equipped. Nice yard and deck. Would definitely stay here again.

Location cannot be beat. We walked downtown everyday. Short drive to waterfall hikes and other breweries. Myself, husband and baby were very comfortable in the space. Bed was very comfy. To top it all off we could bring our dog which always makes vacation extra special to spend it with the whole family.
We had a delightful stay in this thoughtfully curated and lovingly appointed sweet cottage. Everything was just right... totally lovely and comfy.
Very beautiful home, fully stocked kitchen with gadgets, pots and pans, spices, coffee, etc. Shower had great water pressure. Comfy bed. Would definitely stay there again.
Stay here! Such a cute place to stay for our trip to Brevard. Everything was great, no complaints. So close to everything as well!

Susie was very responsive and helpful when I had questions. Her house was perfect for two, was very comfortable, and well supplied. Location was great for access to Pisgah and DuPont. And it is well worth walking in the beautiful neighborhood.
we had a fabulous time at Susie's air BNB. Great location, we could walk to coffee every morning! Just lovely.

Susie’s cottage is 100% perfect…safe, comfortable, beautiful and quiet. It’s a magical oasis, in fact, and I would return here again in a heartbeat if visiting Brevard. Susie is responsive and personable and it’s likely you’ll also be greeted by a white squirrel upon your arrival. I have nothing but rave reviews to share regarding this property and host.

The Cottage on Laurel is a great place to stay for a couple. It is exactly like the pictures. A charming cottage. Convenient to everything. The back deck was a great place to sit and relax and watch the squirrels. The bed was so comfortable. We will definitely stay there again and I have mentioned it to several others who came for our event and I know they will be using it.

We enjoyed our week at Susie’s place. The location was perfect, it was easy to walk downtown and really close to groceries, drugstore and Pisgah and Dupont forest. We went there for biking and really appreciated the calm of the place after our rides and a big plus, the bed was super confortable.
The outside with the flowers just coming out day after day was as perfect as the inside.
Thank you for all Susie!!!
Wonderful cottage in downtown Brevard small and quaint and perfect for two. Quiet ans peaceful neighbourhood at walking distance from restaurants and shops. Would definitely recommend and return

We had a lovely stay! The location of the cottage is very close to downtown Brevard, which is full of great shops and restaurants. It is also not far from some really nice hikes in Pisgah National Forest and Dupont State Forest. The neighborhood was nice for taking our dogs on a walk. We would stay here again!

Susie’s home was a wonderful place to stay while in Brevard. Downtown was within easy walking distance but the neighborhood was still quiet. We enjoyed sitting on the back deck watching the squirrels run around. Sadly we never did spot a white one. I would love to come back and stay again!
Susie is a great host. We enjoyed our stay.

The cottage on Laurel was absolutely perfect for our needs during our trip to Brevard.
This quaint little cottage was well appointed, clean and private. Within walking distance to down town and the back yard was perfect for our fur baby while we had lunch on the back deck watching the squirrels scurry around.
Susie was a wonderful host who accommodated a late check out request. Friendly and quick with responses.
We will definitely choose the cottage on laurel when visiting again.

The house was incredibly sweet and cozy, with a private feel while within easy walking distance of downtown. Great backyard for the dog to play in, as well. The house felt comfortable from the moment we walked in the door. Also super close to Smoke On for amazing barbecue!

Susie’s place is great! It’s cozy and perfect for a weekend getaway. Close to town and lovely neighborhood that feels safe and quiet. The bed was super comfortable and all the amenities in the house we as described. Clean and well-kept! Thank you Susie!

this was our second stay at Susie's cottage, and we loved it just as much as the first time. It is beautifully decorated with antiques and is very cozy and private. we also love the spot because it is convenient to relatives that we visit in Brevard every year. Susie has always been very gracious, flexible, and welcoming. Highly recommend.

I will be back!! Great place and location and host! You will have a wonderful relaxing time and the place is just beautiful and cozy. The bed was more comfortable than my own at home! Thank you Susie!

We had a great weekend in this cozy cabin! It had everything we needed and then some. The location is perfect: walking distance to downtown, just a short drive to hiking trails and nestled in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. We would stay here again.
Susie's place was so beautiful - I didn't want to leave! The bed was the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in. I wish I could give it 10 stars!!

We loved our stay here. Susie's place is the perfect basecamp for enjoying all the hikes and waterfalls in the area. We walked to downtown every evening for dinner and felt so comfortable in the home. Everything was as described and the home is in great shape and the neighborhood was peaceful and quiet. We will stay here again on our next trip to the area. Highly recommend this place for an individual or couple traveling to this area.

Laurel Cottage was everything I expected and more. I felt right at home and I liked that I could walk to restaurants, coffee shops, the library, and stores in Brevard’s cute uptown area. The location makes it quiet and private. And it was just so cozy. I’ll be back!
Great trip. Have been to Brevard many times. This is a nice, well located cottage.

Excellent! The pictures don’t quite capture just how quaint and cozy this cottage is. Everything that you might need is in place and we could’ve spent hours watching the squirrels (both white and grey!) frolic in the garden. The town of Brevard is perfectly situated for exploring nearby waterfalls and State Parks and has good restaurants, bars and shops. We had a wonderful stay at Laurel Cottage and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for an idyllic escape.

We loved how close we were to downtown restaurants and Mt. Pisgah National Forest. Susie’s cottage was comfortable, quiet and peaceful. Perfect for the two of us. We will definitely consider returning for our next trip to Brevard.

We loved this place! The cottage was charming with beautiful hardwood floors and impressive cabinetry made by the host. The location was about a 7 minute walk from downtown restaurants and shops, and very quiet. Pisgah and Dupont were short drives for hiking and adventures. We look forward to staying here again.
Our stay in Brevard was excellent. Susie is a wonderful host for which we are so thankful. Many thanks.
Perfect location for a stay in Brevard. The house is very clean and nicely decorated. The back porch is great, too! Would definitely stay here again.
Great location. Walkable to downtown. Cute place and clean. We’ll be back!
Beautiful home in a very quiet neighborhood. We loved our stay and definitely plan on a return trip.

Susie’s little cottage is a sweet little cottage beautifully & comfortably furnished. It’s located conveniently near downtown Brevard where there’s plenty of wonderful restaurants, shops, entertainment & breweries. I’d highly recommend this little gem to anyone who would like to enjoy Brevard.
Cute, comfortable cottage.
Cute cabin. Very close to downtown. Nice yard for our dog. Perfect for our weekend hiking in the mountains. We will definitely be back.

I loved staying in this little cottage! Well-appointed and cozy, loved the tree-house vibe. I especially appreciated having a tub for a hot soak after going on hikes. Beautiful and quiet street, enjoyed walking downtown for dinner. Great spot!
This was our second stay at this adorable cottage. It had all we needed, fantastic location and great Hostess!

My husband & I truly enjoyed the Cottage on Laurel. It was cozy, quiet & "emphasis" clean. There were a lot of sweet touches thruout the cottage. Everywhere u looked, u spotted some unique item. The furniture fit the cottage & was placed out well, making the cottage very functional. We really appreciated having the 2 bathrooms. Loved the outside deck overlooking the backyard. U could walk into town from the cottage but chose to drive in, just a few minutes. It was super convenient. Unfortunately, I didn't spot a white squirrel this time around but hopefully next time. We'd definitely would stay here again.
ayWe really enjoyed our stay. Very cozy and comfortable retreat. Great getaway for a couple!

We were attending a workshop at the Brevard Music Center. Susie's house was perfect for our stay. Quiet, tree-lined, walk-able neighborhood. Close to downtown. The house was cozy and had everything we needed. We'll definitely stay here again when we visit Brevard.

What an amazing cottage in a very safe and peaceful neighborhood. Had everything you would need and was extremely comfortable. Was also extremely easy to find and check-in. Best part was the walkability to downtown! We will definitely stay here again! Thank you for such a great stay!!!!
Wonderful trip to Brevard while staying in this cottage! Everything was comfortable and cozy with the perfect touches of home. We hope to come back and stay again!
Had a great time staying. Would definitely return.
Delightful cabin in a safe and secure neighborhood. Everything was as described and we enjoyed the coziness and comfort.

The quaintest, most lovely and charming little cottage! We truly didn’t want to leave. The house is very clean and comfortable. We slept great and loved being able to walk into town through the adorable neighborhood. We will definitely be back!
We loved staying here! Perfect abode for two people. Cute decorations, comfortable furniture, great back patio, walkable to downtown! We would definitely stay here again!

Susie's place was perfect for a couple wanting a location that is private and close to downtown Brevard. It was very clean and organized with most everything provided. The various areas such as a computer workspace, two bathrooms which was very nice, a mudroom for when our dog came in, and a very nice television setup. Even having a coat rack and umbrellas next to the door was a nice added touch. Hopefully we will get another chance to use it again!

The pictures hardly do it justice; Susie's place is beautiful, quaint, comfortable, clean, well-decorated, and thoughtfully managed. It has everything you could need for a getaway in Brevard.
The bed is very comfortable, the kitchen is well stocked (including coffee!) and there are great antique pieces and beautiful art throughout the home. The fact that you can bring dogs is an added benefit.
We'll be coming back!

This is the third time I’ve stayed at this property but it won’t be the last. Great place for one or two people. Great amenities great location. The kitchen is well stocked and the back deck is perfect for winding down after a day of hiking or biking.
Charming place in a beautiful setting.
Comfy, cozy, well stocked cottage in a great location. Cool little place. Very clean.

We travel to Brevard often to visit family and love finding accommodations close to downtown. We’ve enjoyed this cozy cottage multiple times! It’s tiny, but wonderfully appointed with everything needed for a lovely stay.
Such a cute cottage! Perfect location and super cozy. I will definitely rent this one again!

Susie was generous to allow us to come In a bit early . We had a long and cold rainy drive in from florida. The location is pretty close to town within walking distance, maybe a bit far in rainy weather. There tons of restaurants in the area . Very safe neighborhood and we appreciate even the cute stream in the back yard. Only two mentions for place it would be a-little better if there was a curtain on bathroom shower area just person preference. Your not in full view or anything just feels more private . Only other concern we had was home add a bit of a moisture smell . In fairness highly sensitized to it due to allergies and it rained quite a bit recently which I am not sure contributes to it.

I stayed at Susie’s magical place for a personal retreat. It was perfect for me!
Her beautiful and well-appointed and beautifully decorated. cottage is walkable to downtown. Make sure to check out the farmers market if you are there on Saturday!
Susie was very responsive and friendly when I had a few questions.
I would absolutely stay in Susie’s cottage again. Thanks so much, Susie!
Obsessed with the cozy cottage. It was perfect for my husband and I. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We would definitely stay here again!
Great stay great host!

We’ve been looking forward to staying at this cute place for some time and it did not disappoint. The lovely walkable neighborhood and proximity to downtown were important to us. The house is well appointed with everything one needs and the bed is super comfy! And it’s pet friendly! Susie was responsive and willing to help, if needed.

Located in a nice neighborhood near downtown with easy parking. We were visited by white squirrels and rabbits almost every day. Backyard has a natural view with a bamboo stand and a small stream. House is clean with nice décor and has everything you need, plus a lot of uncommon extras, like a space heater, coffee, kid's games, and coat racks for the winter. No problems with internet. TV had FireTV and local channels (rare to find in an Airbnb).

This little cabin is absolutely perfect! Spotlessly Clean, totally comfortable, & with everything I needed for my stay. Lovely neighborhood, quiet and close to everything. I’ll be going back there again!

We loved our weekend at Susie’s adorable house. There were so many personal touches that made it feel a lot more like home than many other places we’ve stayed. So cozy, so cute, and everything you need for a weekend away!
We enjoyed a peaceful retreat at this lovely cottage. The location is perfect for mountain biking and hiking.
Great space. Comfortable, convenient and quiet. Loved it
This cottage is close to town, quiet and has lots of charm. It had everything we needed for our stay. Puppy enjoyed it too. Highly recommend Cottage on Laurel!
The most adorable and comfortable cottage! As long as steps aren't a problem, this is the perfect place for one or two, in the sweet village of Brevard NC.
A very cute and cozy little house in a great location! We were able to walk downtown which meant that we never had to hassle with finding parking. I would definitely recommend staying here!
This is a lovely cottage in a great location. Quiet yet close to town. We had everything we needed. Kitchen was well appointed. Our dog was happy too. We would definitely stay here again.
The cute cottage is walking distance to downtown Brevard with its shops and fun restaurants. A perfect location! We will return often.
Very clean, quiet, cute cottage. Susie very accommodating. Also good location - easy access to activities.

This Airbnb is just delightful! It is adorable, comfortable, quiet, clean and private. It is tastefully decorated and has everything you could possibly need. Communication was excellent. It would certainly be my first choice to rent again if I ever return to Brevard.
Adorable little cottage.

Charming cottage on a quiet street in close and walkable proximity to downtown. Attention to detail is great. It is clean, comfortable, and has all you need without overdoing the what and the amount required. Highly recommend this as a place to stay while in Brevard.
Beautiful cottage, beautiful scenery. Thank you for a wonderful experience.

This stay was like traveling back in time to visit a favorite Great Aunt. I loved all the antiques and vintage door knobs. Finding fresh cut hydrangeas over the sink, indoor plants, and blooming hostas in the yard, helped connect to the reason of my visit, nature. I highly recommend this adorable stay.

What a wonderful stay! Walking distance to downtown. A backyard worth spending an evening or two or three in to watch nature and listen to the creek. Foam mattress bed (which we love). Two bathrooms (nice even if just two of you!) Quiet and cozy. Spotless. Good communication. We'd stay here again.

The cottage on Laurel is a great choice for Brevard. It's close to the highway and close enough to walk through the neighborhood to get to downtown. On your morning walks you will most likely see the famous white squirrels of Brevard. Susie has everything as advertised and more. The accessories are more than promised and the house was clean and neat. All appliances worked as they're supposed to and the bed is comfortable. We will definitely return to the cottage on Laurel.

This cute cottage had all we needed. It's an easy walk into town and was clean and well supplied. We enjoyed a glass of wine on the back deck watching fireflies and in the morning while sipping coffee a Brevard white squirrel entertained us in the back yard.
This cottage is located in a quiet neighborhood and a short 10 minute walk to downtown. The space cozy and and perfect for our stay. We’d definitely love to return.
Perfect location and quiet road for a weekend in Brevard

The cottage is indeed only 10 minutes walking from the heart of all the shops and restaurants downtown.
The place is also a lot bigger in person than it appears on the webpage. Super cute and well appointed with the kitchen downstairs with a back deck and the bedroom and living room upstairs. we loved the neighborhood it was in as well.
Very clean, comfortable and cozy and thoughtfully appointed. Perfect for the two of us!
Wonderful property! Well worth it, and the town is a hikers paradise! The surrounding area is beautiful, so if the mountains are calling you, check this one out!
Enjoyed our stay, easy to work with and will be back!
Great house in a good location. Very clean, with everything we needed. Highly recommended!
Great location in cute neighborhood with short walk to town. Very charming cottage, highly recommend!

Interesting lay out. Older house. (Not a bad thing) Very clean. Full amenities. Allowed an early check in which helped me out a great deal. Conveniently located near downtown. Quiet at night. Safe neighborhood. We walked around with our dog and had no issues. Not much to add further. Just a solid Airbnb.
Cute and cozy. Perfect for my wife and I. Very comfortable, the kitchen is very well equipped. The oak furniture is especially beautiful.
Laurel Cottage is a great place to stay if your travels bring you to Brevard, NC. It's very clean and located in a great neighborhood.
Susie’s space was great; exactly as described. We found the location to be great just a short walk to downtown Brevard. Susie was both flexible and accommodating to our needs. We will be back again!
Great location in downtown Brevard. Cute little cottage and very comfortable.
We had a wonderful stay at the cottage. Very clean and great location.

This little cottage is exactly as described and shown in the pictures. Super cute interior. Comfortable bed! We used the kitchen to cook dinner one night and had everything we needed. It was nice to have a dining room table to eat meals at. My husband used the large desk in the living room to work at in the evenings. The location was great for what we were doing in the area. Susie is quick to respond to questions and even left us a voicemail when a particular light went out prior to our visit and couldn't be replaced. It wasn't a big deal as the bathroom had another light, but we appreciate the communication and transparency. The only reason for the 4 star for cleanliness was there was dog hair in the living room and on the couch. The rest of the cottage was very clean!

Fantastic stay!!!!!! Only reason for 4 out of 5 stars is that we ran into issues with the wifi a few times that required rebooting. We were working remotely during our stay so for traditional guests I doubt there would be a problem. Despite the technical challenges, Susie was quick to respond and very helpful! Would highly recommend the Laurel Cottage to anyone looking for a cozy retreat in Brevard!
Quaint interior and calm atmosphere. Just what we needed. Thank you, Susie!
We loved our stay at the cottage! It was a perfect couple’s getaway. It’s super close to downtown, and it was very clean and cozy.
We enjoyed our stay! The cottage was cozy, clean, and comfortable! Highly recommend for a couple’s weekend.

Susie’s place was perfect! It’s walking distance to downtown, and there are so many cute restaurants and breweries to check out. We visited during a snow storm and Susie was very accommodating, and made sure we had everything we needed. Highly recommend!

Susie’s place is the perfect combination of quaint and peaceful! The location is perfect for exploring the beautiful neighborhoods around downtown and perfect for those never wanting to get back into your vehicle to experience all of what downtown has to offer.
This was such a cute and cozy home that had everything we needed for our stay! Communication with Susie was a breeze.

I wish I could give this cottage 6 stars or more. It is more charming than the pictures demonstrate, was meticulously clean, well stocked and in
good repair. Modern kitchen appliances with well stocked kitchen. The hostess even provides many toiletries and coffee. Susie was very responsive and helpful when we had questions. We would very much like to stay there again on future visits to family in the area.

Lovely cottage perfect for two.
Postives:
Cute, interesting architecture inside. 1 BR on main level with bathroom. Kitchen and second bathroom downstairs.
Walking distance to downtown Brevard.
Well stocked kitchen with spices, cooking oil, slat pepper, sugar, etc., and a cannister of ground coffee in the fridge.
Nice oven and stove, lots of pots, pans, plates, bowls, glasses, cups, even a salad spinner.
Nicely decorated inside, homey, lots of knickknacks.
Two bathrooms - one in the main level BR, one downstairs opposite the kitchen table.
Nice big yard behind the house.
Nice family room comfy couch and chairs, flatscreen (we brought our own Roku), desk with chair.
In a nice quiet neighborhood quite suitable for walking the dog.
Negatives:
House had a pronounced musty smell. We had to air it out when we checked in. Odor probably came from musty basement, but also bathroom on main level.
Overall, a great stay. We would definitely stay here again. If you plan on eating in, this place works well. Walkable to town, too.
Lovely cottage in a great location, cute layout, comfortable bed. We saw a white squirrel outside the dining room window!
Fantastic little cottage :) very cozy. Susie was very helpful with hiking suggestions as well. We loved our stay here!

The cottage on Laurel is a perfect location if you're planning a stay in the Brevard area. The cottage is in easy walking distance of downtown Brevard with easy access to the national forest and the Blueridge Parkway. Susie is a great host and has completely outfitted the house for anyone who schedules a stay. The kitchen and bathrooms are better outfitted than any other BnB in which we've stayed. We arrived very late our first night and Susie had left many lights on for us. We can't think of anything we would have needed for our stay that Susie hadn't already thought about. We will be back!
Great location and a really cute and cozy home! Would love to stay here again! It was perfect.

Excellent house in an excellent location. Very clean and comfortable stay with communicative and pleasant hosts. We hiked all over Pisgah and Dupont. This was a great base camp. Would stay there again for sure.

This place has it all. Great walking distance from all that downtown has to offer (.5 miles to center of city), beautiful furnishings, cozy feel. We didn't realize that Halloween was such a "thing" in Transylvania County and were presently surprised to see a host of holiday activities geared toward that theme. We saw our fist white squirrel when we were unpacking the car and another one as we were getting ready to leave! Hiking, great beer and fabulous food were all within easy reach. We will be back for sure!

Perfect cozy cottage convenient to downtown- just the right size for my husband and I plus the pup. We were in town for a wedding and also enjoyed DuPont and Pisgah while we were there. Hope to be back someday.

So perfect. Very comfortable, well decorated place. Susie did not miss a thing. It has anything you could possibly need. Great location walkable to downtown we loved the neighborhood and enjoyed watching all the squirrels.
Great location, great amenities, and extremely clean! A wonderful place to stay.

A lovely cottage in a great location. The cottage is beautiful and comfy. The full kitchen downstairs is very well equipped. Brevard is an adorable college town with lots going on, great shops, and surrounded by natural beauty including waterfalls!

Susie’s cottage was just as described! This is a great location for couples traveling with their four legged children. Nice yard with room to run.
Excellent location to down town.
Super cute with everything you need and then some.
We will definitely be visiting again!!

Great place to stay. It was perfect for two people. Clean, cozy, well appointed. The kitchen has everything needed to make any meal. Two full bathrooms also added to the convenience. We had a great time sitting on the back porch in the evenings or playing with our dog in the back yard. The location was very convenient; walkable to downtown. We’ll certainly stay here again next time we go to Brevard.

Such a cute and cosy cottage to stay in and just right for two. Enjoyed sitting out on the back deck under the trees in the evening making the most of the beautiful and secluded back yard. Great location for exploring Pisgah area and with an easy walk into Brevard for dinner and exploring down town. Highly recommend staying here if you get the chance.

Cute cottage perfect for a couple wanting to explore the Brevard area. It’s been remodeled very nicely. The basement is the kitchen, with the Den & Bedroom on main level. My only change would be to consider putting a king bed in the BR. So, if you don’t mind sleeping in a queen, you’re good to go. TV does have local stations but nothing else unless you want to use your Netflix, Amazon or Hulu accounts on the TV apps. Again, a great rental home for the value & location there in Brevard!👍😁
Great little place and walking distance to downtown. We'd definitely rent it again.

Cute cottage in a nice neighborhood. Close to town and short drives to waterfalls. Very clean. The cottage included all amenities needed (bath supplies like shampoo and soap; kitchen had dishwasher tablets, dishwashing liquid, seasonings, Brita water filter pitcher).
Enjoyable stay!
Terrific space and location. We really enjoyed our time at this cottage and exploring Brevard. Susie was great at communicating and very responsive. You won't be disappointed at this place.
This is a great place to stay. Walkable distance to downtown. The cottage is in great shape and is very comfortable. 5 out of 5 would stay again.
nice, quaint home; quiet.
We loved our stay! The location is perfect and the cabin has everything you need.

Great communicators and a very cute and homey location! Was able to receive recommendations and never felt hesitant to reach out for questions about my stay! I have no doubt that I will be back in the future
House is located on a quiet street close to the center of town. It is a wonderful place to stay.

This delightful little cottage was tucked away on a very private and quiet street. The work Susie and her husband have done on the home modernized the space but did not detract from the charm of it's 1930's era. The space was clean, quiet, cozy and safe. The A/C system was amazing and kept us cool on a few hot and humid days. The hot water was instant and hot! Even though there is one bedroom, it was super convenient to have two bathrooms! The bed was very comfortable and the kitchen was stocked with everything you could possibly need.
I loved that it was a very short walk (.5 mile) to downtown Brevard. The best part of the walk was the white squirrel that we spotted daily in front of the same house just a few doors down.
All in all a lovely stay with many things to do in the general area from shopping to biking to hiking.

I absolutely loved my short stay at Susie's cottage. It is as cute as the pictures suggest! The location is great- just a short drive or longer walk to downtown- and the house is well-equipped with everything you might need.

The perfect place! The space is so clean, full of light, with a big backyard and porch to relax after a busy day on one of the many hiking trails around the area. Susie thought of every special touch to make sure the place had everything we need to enjoy ourselves.
We had a nice stay, the cottage was a nice place to relax after long days of hiking in the Pisgah National Forest.
We loved our stay at the cottage! Perfect for a couple and amazing location close to downtown Brevard. I would recommend Susie’s place to anyone looking for a quiet retreat!
Susie’s cottage was precious! Very clean, charming, and in a perfect location!

Fantastic stay! We loved all the little touches of beauty and artistry inside and out. Sweet and easy walk to downtown. The peaceful deck and lush landscape is so relaxing. Two bathrooms are perfect for a couple. Everything you might need in the kitchen. We hope this gorgeous home is available for our next Brevard trip. We're smitten!
Susie's cottage is fabulous! It is so close to downtown area, and easy driving to the trails. So clean and well appointed. We absolutely loved staying here! We hope to stay again and again!
Great cottage in the middle of it all. So easy to walk to downtown
Susie was a great host and the house was everything I expected and more!
Darling cottage. Perfect for 2 people and pup. Excellent location.

Laurel Cottage is wonderful retreat near Pisgah forest! The house is well furnished for a long stay with a fully stocked kitchen and washer and dryer. Susie is a wonderful and accessible host. Highly recommend staying at the Laurel Cottage!
Very clean, super cute. Brevard is adorable!

This cottage is perfect! Everything you could possibly need is there ready to use. Everything was super clean and so comfortable! Location was so close to everything and walking distance to downtown. We hope to stay again in the near future.
Amazing place, thanks so much! The look from the outside belies the space within. No better place for one or two people in downtownish Brevard, A+.

We loved the little quaint feeling of the cottage. It is so close to town and minutes from great mountain bike trails and hiking trails. This place is great for a couple and I liked having two bathrooms. The back patio made for a great spot to enjoy morning coffee. We made meals every night and found the kitchen to be adequately stocked with almost everything we needed. The Brita in the fridge was a nice touch, and it was nice having plenty of coffee for each morning. All in all we had a great time and would highly recommend it for a nice getaway.

Super cute cottage. My husband and I stayed with our dog for our 28th wedding anniversary. Went to hike the lovely waterfalls in the area. Great location near downtown that we walked to for dinner and shopping. Lots of thoughtful extras like had coffee and spices. Well stocked kitchen which is downstairs. Susie was very helpful for dinner suggestions and hikes. Easy checkin and check out.

My dog and I loved Susie’s cottage. The house was so cute and everything we could have wanted. The location was perfect— only a short walk to downtown or quick trip up into the national forest for hikes. Couldn’t have asked for a better stay!
This was an amazing place — extremely clean and an excellent location.
My wife and I had a wonderful time and would definitely come back!
Super-cozy, just right for a weekend getaway.

We loved the space! It was just right for us and our pup. The kitchen was well stocked and had all that we needed for cooking our meals. It was VERY clean, and the attention to being COVID-mindful was evident. The location was fantastic - we walked downtown a couple times and enjoyed the local shops.
The house is only 10 minutes from property we just purchased, so it’s nice to know there is a perfect Airbnb available for the back and forth. We will 100% be back.
What a sweet and precious cottage! My husband and I were so lucky to be able to stay here for a few days over Christmas. It was extremely clean, a great location, and we can’t wait to stay again!
Beautiful, sweet home — the love and care put into it is so clear! Clean, quiet, and of the best-stocked airbnbs I’ve visited, too! I enjoyed a peaceful trip and hope to come back.
Coziest little cottage. Perfect location.

We loved everything about our stay at the cottage. Location is perfect, walking distance to downtown and just a short 10-15 minutes in the car to stellar hiking routes. Pisgah never fails to impress. We like to cook most of our own meals and the kitchen here is great. All of the appliances are high quality and the space is very functional. Washer and dryer make for clean hiking clothes every day without over packing :) The bedroom is cozy and does make you feel like you are nestled in the trees. Our dog appreciated the big backyard. It is not entirely fenced in but is protected/secluded enough that as long as I was with her she was fine playing off leash. Parking was easy and check in/out is a breeze. If I could give more "stars" I would. Highly recommend. We will be back!
This cozy little cottage was perfect. It was very clean, comfortable, and had everything we needed. We hope to come again and would highly recommend

Perfect little spot for a traveling couple. We loved how close we were to downtown Brevard (walking distance) and how quiet the neighborhood was. We were very close to the hikes we planned as well. Brevard is such a cute little town with so many great options that it can be tough to choose sometimes and I feel like the cottage is a perfect representation of the town. We brought our dog too and she loved the area due to the walkability and abundance of squirrels! A trip we never forget and would love to return again in the future.

Susie’s Place was just what we needed to escape Election Day and all of the vote tabulations. DuPont State Forest and Pisgah National Forest provided miles and miles of wonderful hiking trails. We dined outside at three local restaurants: Marcos Tratorria, The Squre Root and Sunrise Cafe. Susie has COVID cleaning procedures in place and provided sanitizing wipes, sprays and hand sanitizer. We were blessed with incredible weather, which only heightened the experience. Had wine and cheese on the deck and enjoyed watching the Brevard white squirrels in the yard. Will definitely try to return.

Perfect cottage for two. Nice touches such as hand soap, tissues, coffee and lots of little nice things. Good kitchen and nice bathrooms . Walking distance to down town . Make sure you visit the waterfall.

We loved our stay at the cottage! It was cozy, intimate, and romantic - just what we wanted! The bedroom is comfortable and provide enough space for a couple! Its conveniently located to the downtown Brevard and its close to amazing hiking and waterfall spots. The backyard was perfect for our intimate and small elopement wedding. We would love to come back for our anniversary!
Laurel Cottage was perfect for our anniversary getaway! Clean and comfortable and perfectly located. Hiking spots and waterfalls all a short drive away. Highly recommend!

We had a wonderful stay at the cottage - location provided easy access to the two local national forests along with Dupont State Recreational Forest and Gorges State Park - providing plentiful hiking and waterfall adventures - the cottage is very comfortable - clean - and quiet affording some wonderful sleep on the comfortable bed after long days on the trails. Close to town - good value - certainly happy we found this rental - enjoy all the area has to offer -

This cute cottage is such a lovely gem in Brevard! It’s extremely convenient to the quaint downtown of Brevard as well as some beautiful hikes & sights in the Pisgah National Forest. If you have extra time to explore, we discovered a beautiful family owned farm & orchard only about 20 minutes away - Jeter Mountain Farm. We’ll definitely be back to the area and would love to stay in this space again!

This cottage was absolutely perfect! I have high standards for cleanliness and this place felt very clean which is so important right now. The cottage itself is walkable to downtown but the area was very quiet. We had a toddler and a dog and we had a great time just hanging out in the back yard. The whole place was well stocked with essentials and the kitchen had everything I needed to cook. We loved the personality of this cottage and would absolutely stay again for our next visit to brevard.

Lovely cottage, everything you could need and more. We wanted to get away, see some mountains and waterfalls and Brevard did not disappoint. With Covid we did take out, both a ten- Sora Sushi and Blue Smoke BBQ. I would highly recommend staying here, it is really perfect for a couple and our pup!
We really enjoyed our stay. It was very close to downtown, Pisgah National Forest and DuPont Forest. We had everything we needed. We look forward to staying here again with our dog.

This is an adorable home in a great location in Brevard that has everything you need for a longer stay. Susie is great to communicate with and the check in process is very easy. We loved our stay and hope to be back!

Really cute little house walking distance to restaurants and stores in Brevard. We walked to get take-out and had dinner at the table set by the window downstairs. Had breakfast sitting outside on the porch. Clean, cute and quiet place to stay!
The cottage is in an excellent location and is a great place to call home after a long day exploring the waterfalls. We’ll be back!

Absolutely lovely cottage stay! Sparkling clean, excellent location, so close to Pisgah Forrest for amazing hikes. It was fun to be able to walk downtown to dine.
Susie was a wonderful, responsive, helpful host!
Lovely house, beautifully decorated. Short walk to shops, restaurants, farmers market. Perfect location for hiking get-away. We really enjoyed our stay!
Very charming, very clean, great location. We really enjoyed our stay. Could not have been happier.

Great space close to the downtown area. We were in town for hiking and it was pretty central to everything. The house was very clean and we enjoyed that there was a kitchen so we could cook. The bed was really comfy and just enough space for the two of us!

I definitely want to return. It was a perfect location from town. It was a comfortable, cozy spot during the afternoon thunderstorms. It was close to so many hiking trails. The kitchen had many useful utensils. Home was very clean.House seemed much larger on the inside compared to what is seen from the street. Very thoughtfully furnished. We loved it.

Stay here as often as you can! This is such a lovely cottage and our stay could not have been lovelier. The house itself is reminiscent of a cottage in the English countryside and it is immaculately furnished. Susie was very responsive and the pricing was perfect. We will definitely make this our go to stay whenever we can get up to Brevard. This was simply charming and homey.
Location is great and I love the layout of this cottage. Everything was super clean and cozy.

Laurel Cottage was a perfect getaway location - easy to walk to town and within an easy drive to all the gorgeous hiking spots and waterfalls. The hosts anticipated everything and anything a visitor could want! The house was comfy, spacious, sparkling clean, and the backyard was a sight to behold! We can't wait to come back.
Super clean and convenient 10minute walk to town👍

We loved our stay here! My sister and I were here for a short hiking trip in the area. The cottage was a really close drive to lots of great waterfalls, but also close to downtown for easy quick takeout meals (we enjoyed Pad Thai, The Cardinal Drive-In, and Blue Ridge Bakery). The cottage was just as cute as the pictures look--tons of natural light upstairs with the living room and bedroom. Porch looked tranquil, though it was unseasonably cold so we didn't go out there. We saw this is as a bit of splurge for a hiking getaway, but it was totally worth it!
This is an adorable cottage in a perfect location to enjoy the parks and beauty of Brevard. Superhost provides thoughtful touches that make you feel right at home. Lovely 💕
The house is close enough to walk to downtown and very clean. The deck in the backyard is a great place to relax and watch the white squirrels!
Another wonderful stay at this lovely cottage. A relaxing and centrally located cottage to adventure in Brevard and DuPont State Forest. The location is ideal for walking into town to shop and eat.
Susie’s place was great! Highly recommend.

We loved our stay at this adorable cottage! The location was perfect. We were able to walk to downtown Brevard.
We did some cooking and the kitchen had everything we needed. The back porch was one of our favorite spots at the house.
Just a heads up if you're tall (my husband is 6'9"), you may have to duck a bit in the downstairs area as the ceiling is a little low. But if you're average-normal height, you should be just fine. :)
We would absolutely stay here again.
Be ready to be bedazzled! This adorable little cottage for two has it all. Susie was great and responded quickly, and everything was clean with all the conveniences of home! We loved our stay!

One word: delightful! We had an amazing time at this beautiful cottage in Brevard. After a last minute ski trip cancellation, my husband and I were able to escape to Susies gorgeous home. We immediately felt at home in the cottage and cherished our time there. We also enjoyed daily walks to downtown (7 minutes at a strolling pace), and daily hikes in DuPont Forest. Now I’m just thinking of reasons to get back to this amazing place! Thanks again for a fabulous stay.
Super cute and cozy! Very private setting and convenient location. Highly recommend.

The cottage was so cute and clean, and it was in the perfect location! We saw a white squirrel while driving in the neighborhood! Susie was quick to respond to all of our questions and messages. We enjoyed our time there.
Great find! Close to downtown, beautiful and spacious house, and a wonderful host. A great value for hikers who want to check out Brevard! 6/5
Charming and cozy home away from home! Coffee, backyard, and multiple thoughtful amenities and location make this a great place to stay!
You can expect a very charming, clean cottage. The bed was very comfortable. I would stay here again. Made for just 2 people. It was perfect.

Susie’s home is beautiful! Perfect for our weekend stay. Very clean and comfortable. Lots of character. In a super cute neighborhood close to downtown. Susie was nice and easy to communicate with. Would definitely stay again!
Cute little place super close to downtown!
Susie’s place was great! Super cozy! So convenient to downtown and a short drive to awesome hiking in Pisgah! Highly recommend!!

Laurel Cottage is an adorable house in Brevard. It was exceptionally clean plus many nice amenities. We enjoyed walking into town (about a 10 minute easy walk) for shopping and meals. Susie was a wonderful host and very quick to respond to questions. We would definitely stay there again!
Great fun

We spent Christmas at the cottage, and it was wonderful! It’s such a cozy space, much bigger than anticipated and just a short walk or drive to downtown. Highly recommend this spot for a couple, and it was great to have a quiet neighborhood for walks with our pup. Will most definitely be back again!

Super clean and sparking, this gem of a cottage offers lovely little details and far more space than expected. The kitchen is fabulous, and the Upstairs seating area truly lovely. The bedroom is comfy and having two full baths for two people, is also a super plus.

A cute house just a ten min walk from mainstreet Brevard. Beautifully furnished with a real eye for little touches and guest comfort. I could live there. We stayed around town for this trip, but this would be a great base-camp for day-trips into Pisgah and beyond.
Cute cottage with everything you need, clean, and a great location. This was our second time staying there and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again

Susie’s home was impeccably clean and well organized. It has everything you need for a stay in Brevard. It’s within walking distance to downtown, a quick drive to any of the grocery stores in town, and about a 10 minute drive to the entrance to Pisgah. Perhaps the most convenient thing about the home was the kitchen. It has all of the essentials(olive oil, seasonings, condiments, tea, coffee, etc) for cooking away from home, which is not always the case with AirBnB’s. We would absolutely stay there again! Thanks Susie for a wonderful stay!
We loved the house and neighborhood! Cozy stay close to downtown.
Susie's Laurel cottage is really cute, in a nice neighborhood and convenient to downtown. Lots of fun, thank you

If what you are looking for as a exquisitely charming and well appointed cottage for you (and your significant other if traveling together) this is the place. Look no further. Walkable to downtown Brevard, this neighborhood cottage is private, well appointed, and very clean. It's right up there as a favorite among all the Airbnb's we've enjoyed through the years.
Fantastic stay. Clean, close to town.

This place is a gem. Nestled in a charming neighborhood close to town, I enjoyed walking everywhere. I loved the privacy, the back deck, and how well-appointed everything was. Comfy bed and soft bedding, fluffy towels, and a coffee maker I could program for the morning- plus coffee in the fridge. It was everything I was hoping for my solo visit to Brevard.
Thanks so much!

The house is beautiful & only a short drive to town. Don't count on Ubers to get home lol. We made that mistake and ended up walking home after the White Squirrel Festival 😂🍺🦦. Other than that house is 10/10. Very peaceful. Good location.

Lovely cabin! Convenient to Brevard and surrounding area. Quality touches throughout - linens, beds, furniture, coffee, toiletries, and well stocked kitchen.
Great spot for star gazing!
My 85 y.o. MIL was with us - the steps up from the drive may require supervision for the very young, or very old. She managed with assistance and once inside was fine. I would also note that we were aware of this when we selected this home as it was clear in the description. We would still choose it again. We had a wonderful stay!

We had a wonderful stay in this beautiful mountain retreat! The cabin was clean, easy to find, and felt secluded from the world, while still being just minutes from downtown and the National Forests. Couldn’t have asked for a better weekend getaway!

Great location looking out over the French Broad River valley. You can tell the host takes great pride in the property.. best equipped property that we have ever stayed with. Close to Brevard and highly recommend!
We loved the location. It was so peaceful and relaxing. Home was very nice and comfy. Will come back! Thank you Jackie!!

Beautiful cabin and we appreciated the excellent heating and gas fireplace during some very cold weather. Comfortable bed and very well equipped kitchen. We knew the area and had no trouble finding it, esp. with the clear instructions. The stone steps that others have commented on were a problem for one of us. Also, the numerous windows in the living/dining room give a nice view but need some blinds, esp. in the dining room. The morning sun was blinding in the winter as it rose over the mountain and we could not sit at the table until afternoon. We appreciated the quick response to our request to book on short notice, and the easy access to town.
This house was perfect for us this weekend! Amazing location. Would recommend this house for anyone. Look forward to going back.
excellent ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We enjoyed our stay at the French Broad Cabin. The cabin was clean and comfortable. It’s a great location for popping into downtown Brevard. Our only note is that there are not curtains or blinds on the large windows/sliding doors in the living room area. While the they provide a beautiful view, at times the sun was very bright in that space and there was no way to block it. Overall we had a great stay at the cabin.

Our family had a wonderful family vacation at the French Broad cabin. It was a comfortable and peaceful place that was very clean and had all the amenities we needed. We had no trouble getting in touch with the host. We would love to stay there again sometime.
We had a wonderful visit!
We had a wonderful time and hope to go back another time!

We had a wonderful stay at the French Broad Cabin. The location is great just outside of Brevard. The owners were prompt to respond from our request to book through our departure. The cabin was a great place for our arge family to gather while visiting Brevard.
This was our third stay at the French Broad Cabin. I can't recommend it highly enough.

The French Broad Cabin is wonderful. Even better than the pictures and description, which are fantastic. The space was comfortable and clean and we felt right at home. Check in and out were a breeze. The location is both convenient but also private and quiet. We hope to visit again in the future when back in the area.
Great location, very nice Cabin. We really enjoyed our stay.
Wonderful trip- easy access to Brevard and to beautiful mountain views. And hosts were very responsive!

We loved our stay at the French Broad Cabin! The home is the second one of three on a long driveway, but we could not see the others from where we were because of beautiful trees and landscaping around the homes. We actually didn’t really see the other two homes at all.
The cabin had a beautiful wooden interior that we loved! It was very cozy, and the views from the balcony were breathtaking. The drive into Brevard was short, and we enjoyed the local shops and restaurants.
There were LOTS of towels available in the bathrooms! That was really nice. Like, a closet full of extra towels.
The dining room table was round with 4 chairs. 4 additional chairs were stacked under a cabinet, and the table comfortably seated 6 for dinner. Additional bar seating was available at the kitchen island.
We had no complaints and would stay here again if we are in the area!

The cabin location was beautifully nestled in a serene location. Looking out the balcony or the top floor at the view, was absolutely breathtaking. I can’t tell you how many times family kept saying that this cabin was the perfect choice. The beds were so comfortable, the kitchen is well equipped with everything you could need. I would absolutely rent this cabin again and highly recommend.
Such a nice and peaceful place to stay. We would definitely rent this house again.
Very convenient to Brevard- just minutes away. Beautiful view of the mountains from the upper deck. Perfect little getaway!

We’ve been renting in Brevard for over five years for family reunion weekends and by far this was the best cabin! We loved the layout of the home which worked so well for our group. There was plenty of all the right kitchen ware and the beds and linens were all so comfy. The property was amazing! Jackie encourages her guests to wander the property which my husband and I did with our two youngest granddaughters at sunset. We all enjoyed seeing the fields of corn and wild flowers. Our group thoroughly enjoyed our stay and hope to be returning guests. Thank you Jackie!

We enjoyed our stay! It was exactly what we were looking for! Beautiful cabin home with a beautiful view! We will be back, as our baby girl now attends college in the area! Thanks for allowing us to stay in your home!
Cute place. Very clean. Good location
Perfect Stay Number 2! We want to come back for stay number three! Felt like home but better!

This was beautiful cabin and we would definitely stay there again if we were in the area. It was clean, comfortable, fully stocked, close to many great sights and in a beautiful setting. The hosts had great instructions and recommendations and I enjoyed the history that it used to be a boys camp. We highly recommend it!

This cabin is great. It was clean and very well stocked with everything we needed. It is comfortable and homey and set on a beautiful property. It's a easy 5 minute drive to downtown; restaurants, grocery store, etc. And it was very quiet and peaceful. It is quite close to the highway which did not bother us at all but just mentioning in case others want to know. I would recommend to friends and would stay here again. Communication from Jackie and Katie was quick, helpful, and friendly.

Jackie’s French Broad Cabin was quiet, peaceful and beautiful. The beds were new and wonderful. Fully stocked kitchen tools and dishes. Exactly like the pictures. We are coming back in two weeks! And staying here again. It was great for us and two teenage daughters. We got to make full meals in the kitchen which saved money as well. Slept like a baby. Dark, cool and quiet bedrooms. The perfect stay.

We enjoyed our short stay. The location is great-only a short drive into town or to Dupont State Park. Although near the highway, it was quiet and peaceful. The cabin itself is beautiful and my wife kept migrating to the cozy chair near the sunlight coming through all of those large windows.
Great stay! We had so much fun exploring the town and area! Loved the cabin, and felt right at home
We loved staying here. Great location with easy access to downtown Brevard, and close to local rivers. Clean and comfortable space with everything we needed. I’d definitely recommend it.
We very much do enjoyed our stay! Definitely recommend this place & would stay again ♥️

Such a great place to stay in Brevard. Very near town but still feels you’re in the mountains. When we return to the area we will check to see if Jackie’s place is available before we book anywhere else!

The cabin was beautiful and a great location, close to Brevard, trails and waterfalls. Jackie was very responsive and the cabin was clean and as described. We will definitely return when we visit Brevard again.

French Broad Cabin was in an ideal location and was a charming home for our vacation. The cabin is spotless and better than the pictures. It has a well appointed living area, cosy bedrooms, and a deck that provides a peaceful space to wind down after a day of hiking. We felt very much at home and highly recommend it to others.
It was a very beautiful place all around very comfortable and cozy. Stay would recommend anybody.

The French Broad cabin was an amazing place to stay! Super convenient and close to all the awesome restaurants, breweries and hiking trails in Brevard. The views were also beautiful. My sister and her friends rented the Little French Broad and we were able to easily walk from our place to theirs!
Would highly recommend! Easy 5 Stars! :-)
Cute cabin located close to downtown Brevard. Host was very responsive. House was clean and well kept.
We had a great time at Jackie’s place. The house is beautiful inside and has everything we needed. Definitely would come back!

The French broad cabin truly has that cabin feel, all wood inside, plenty of authentic furniture. The loft with three single beds is extremely convenient with kids. Would have preferred not to be so close to the highway with the noise and lights, but it was barely noticeable. Only minutes away from downtown Brevard, as well as the Dupont Forest, perfect location.
A great stay in a great location!

The cabin is beautiful. We loved it for our weekend getaway. Just far enough that you felt you had some privacy and quiet, but a five minute drive from anywhere in town. I absolutely recommend staying here!

I have stayed at a lot of places in the Brevard area while mountan biking and this one has topped them all. One of the nicest in the Brevard area for a group of Mountain Bikers, perfect location and perfect space.

Beautiful cabin right by the river. Within minutes to downtown Brevard which has great restaurants and shopping. Cabin was very spacious and had all the amenities to make you feel at home. Beautiful decor and plants. There was plenty of room for our family of four. Great experience, and we will definitely be back!

The cabin was outfitted with high quality sheets, linens, lotions, shampoos, kitchen supplies, furniture, games, TV, Roku streaming device, wifi -- you name it. Convenient to Brevard which had awesome shopping and restaurants and hiking even though it was freezing cold! Also very easy to get to Asheville.
When the upstairs pipes froze, they were there in minutes to help us find a solution on Christmas Eve!
We felt a little cramped when we first got there (a family of four couples and one single) but soon adjusted and the high ceilings and huge windows helped that a lot.
Would recommend 100%.

We thought this cabin was outstanding. Exactly what we hoped for when we booked. It delivered. Beyond quickly responsive hosts on the AirBnB message app, perfect location near Brevard and Hendersonville, and little touches around the house really made it feel like a home in the mountains. Highly recommend for a family get together in the winter.
Excellent! We will be back.

I swear this was the best place ever me and my family didn’t want to leave everything was perfect we drove from Florida to stay and everything was perfect it felt like home… when your ready let us know when we can move in
You will love your stay here...great location, clean, and well furnished! Communication was great! It's very quiet and peaceful and just a few steps from the French Broad River.

Jackie's place is the perfect getaway. While situated next door to another cabin, the location feels secluded and was peaceful and quiet. The primary views from the cabin are of nature (a large beautiful cornfield) and the morning and late afternoon light cause the interior of the cabin to glow (makes for very beautiful family captures!). This place felt more personal than other AirBnb's with all the little touches--real plants, fully stocked with helpful items like sandwich bags and sharpies, homemade quilts, lots of extra towels and even safety features like an escape ladder. Not to mention, the town of Brevard is adorable and just a few minutes drive away!

Our family of four thoroughly enjoyed our few days in Brevard at the French Broad Cabin. The house and grounds are so tranquil and beautiful. The town has such a great vibe. The surrounding forests and mountains offer no shortage of opportunities for recreational activities. We look forward to returning again soon!
Great cabin, great location. Will be back again soon!
One of the best Air BNB’s I’ve stayed in! It’s a true log cabin home and has all the comfort of home! Located 1 minute from the French Broad river. Highly recommend this place! We will be back
The cabin was exactly as described on the website and more! Well located and convenient to town. We enjoyed the stay!
This was a great spot- exactly as described. Easy check in/out and well-equipped. Would definitely go back if we are back in the neighborhood!
Fantastic stay. Very convenient location to downtown Brevard. Loved it.

Wonderful location that is both convenient to downtown Brevard but just far enough out to give the property a quiet, cozy, and secluded feel. The cabin view is wonderful (a gorgeous field of lush-green late-season corn was our front yard). The physical space was both communal and private, clean and comfortable … which made our rain day not a big deal. Lots of space for a family of five to spread out and claim reading nooks, and watch the steady rain. The owners were gracious and very response. Thanks, Jackie and Katie, for a great Labor Day holiday get away!
The cabin is decorated really nice and loved the views with all the green. Location is perfect near all the quaint shops and restaurants. Highly recommended.

Enjoyed a wonderful time in the Brevard area staying at Jackie’s beautiful and well appointed French Broad Cabin. Rent it. You won’t be disappointed! Although one small warning. The stone steps leading up to the cabin are a bit uneven so anyone with mobility issues might be challenged getting in and out. But the place is well worth! By far one of the best Airbnbs we’ve stayed at!

We loved our time at Jackie’s house. It was central to downtown Brevard and easy access to Pisgah and DuPont. The house was very comfortable for our family of five and extremely well appointed. We hope to stay again!
Cabin was in a very convenient location and the property itself is super beautiful would absolutely stay again
Another wonderful trip to Brevard and this special cabin.
This is a great place to stay. Very welcoming, clean, and comfortable. Excellent location as well.

Beautiful, comfortable home in a very quite, private location very close to Brevard and the Pisgah Forest where there are many waterfalls to enjoy! Jackie responds quickly to any inquiries, a great host!

The cabin is even more beautiful than it looks in pictures. It is lovingly decorated, every little touch special and thought out, chosen for peace, comfort and relaxation. The views out the windows are just gorgeous. The location is incredible. I recommend everything about this place!!

The house is exactly as described. Extremely clean, very easy check in, and great communication from the host. Plenty of parking available and myself and all of my family members that stayed here had perfect service here the entire time. The view outside from the porch is incredible at night! Would absolutely recommend staying here!

We had a wonderful stay in the French Broad Cabin. It was super comfortable and had everything we needed for a relaxing stay. The kitchen and bathrooms were perfectly stocked, and the beds and bathrooms were great. We loved the log-cabin feel inside and the houseplants made it feel very homey. The location was perfect! It was only 20 minutes from Dupont State Forest and the town of Brevard was just 5 minutes up the road. We loved it.
Great spot, great host!
This is our second stay. Love the place. We'll be back for a third round, for certain.

This is a great place to stay. It is very clean and has nice amenities.
While we were there we went to Biltmore (about an hour away), Hendersonville (to a wine festival, great little town to explore), and went on a pontoon boat ride on Glenville Lake. We ate at a couple nice places....the outside patio at Cedar Mountain Cafe was nice and also the Sierra Nevada Brewery outside of Ashville. We hiked both Dupont and Pisgah to view some waterfalls. The outside balcony at the cabin overlooks a corn field and was a nice place to sit after a day away. There are some slightly uneven stone steps up to the entrance, but it was not a problem for us. We would definitely stay in this cabin again.

We have stayed in several airbnb homes, and this was one of our best experiences.
Communication and directions to the home were excellent. We arrived at night and found the home without difficulty.
The location and grounds are also very nice. The cabin is close to Brevard but just far enough out to get a good dark night sky and you don't feel like you're "in town". It's an easy drive to Asheville or Greenville.
The home itself was spotless. Appliances were modern and mostly higher-end. Nice towels. Good sheets. Comfy beds. Nice LG washer & dryer. With three kids in tow, I cooked a lot of dinners and packed lunches to take on hikes, and the kitchen supplies were not lacking.
The home itself is very nice. I'd say nicer than the pictures, actually. The wood paneling gives it a very cozy feel. The seating is comfortable with modern lines.

There are ample lighting sources, as well, with general, task and ambient illumination provided by an array of interesting fixtures. (Good lighting is often overlooked by homeowners, and I appreciated this attention to detail.)
Historic photos and interesting information about the history of the property are also presented, which gives some context to the place.
Overall a very relaxing, comfortable, clean and pleasant place to stay.

We absolutely loved our stay. Accommodations were so nicely done, well thought through and inspiring. The history of the cabin was a special touch to learn about and enjoy. Views are peaceful and just lovely.
Kitchen was well appointed and stocked with necessities. We'd most definitely come back!

Jackie’s cabin was perfect for our family. Plenty of room for 4 adults and 2 young kids. My little ones loved the blocks and toys upstairs while the grownups enjoyed the cozy gas fireplace at nighttime. Overall, we loved our stay and would love to stay here again on our next trip to Brevard.

this cabin far exceeded our expectations! it was 6 of us, 3 adults and 3 kids and all the details didn't go unnoticed! Jackie included basics like toilet paper, shampoo/conditioner, soap, cleaning supplies. other Airbnb's I've stayed in we have had to provide all of these things. also, plenty of towels! the location was perfect, you felt like you were in the woods but really only 5 mins from downtown Brevard! we will definitely stay here again!
Wonderful stay in this lovely cabin and property. Very clean and well furnished. Location is great with a short drive into town and close to many waterfalls! Would definitely stay again.
Amazing cabin!! One of the best cabins I’ve stayed at. We came for a ski trip, but wasn’t able to ski. This cabin mad up for it all. We still had a great time!!

Jackie is AMAZING! There are not enough words to describe how amazing, thoughtful, and kind she truly is!
The cabin is roomy, the view is stunning, it has so much natural light, the fire place warms the whole down and upstairs! Brevard is a cute little town! And downtown is so adorable! We were lucky enough that during our stay it snowed covering the fields, tress, and cabin creating a magical feel to the place. Everyone who stayed here wants to return in the other seasons! It's close enough to Asheville to do day trips to see the city and different locations around the city, close to hiking, the French Broad River is a shot walk away! Perfect for writing retreats, family vacation, romantic getaways! The cabin is clean, the beds are comfortable, the internet is great, there are ample towels (we had a group of girls haha), extra blankets! We 100% plan on stay here again! Thank you for the most fantastic experience!
Probably the very nicest Airbnb of about 14 that I have stayed in.

The home was inviting and warm for our weekend getaway. Jackie was quick to respond and was very accommodating. The home was close to downtown and to a great hiking spot. I'll definitely considering staying again the next time I'm in Brevard!

Christmas Getaway. Everything was remarkable! The location was fabulous and the cabin itself was exactly what we were wanting for a peaceful, beautiful Christmas getaway! Jackie decorates the cabin with a tree and fresh wreaths, which made the holidays even more special.Downtown Brevard is a short drive (5mins) away and you can certainly spend hours in the shops and restaurants. We dined at Square Root for dinner and it was delicious! If you want to go to Asheville, its only 45 minutes away. But Brevard has plenty of shops. we didnt do any nature trails, but the forest is nearby and has countless options. 10/10 recommend this location. Plus, Jackie was very helpful and kind through texts leading up to our arrival.

This is just our favorite AirBnB. The cabin is adorable and comfortable. Our family with 2 teens spent several days pre-Christmas and it was the perfect home base for winter hikes, watching holiday movies and just relaxing and connecting. We arrived at night to a Christmas tree lighting the window—such a sweet welcome! Loved seeing the white squirrels on the property. It’s so quiet yet close to Brevard, DuPont and Pisgah. We will definitely be back!

The French Broad Cabin was stunning -- better than the photographs! It was truly perfect for my mom's 70th birthday celebration and our first family reunion in two years. The kitchen is extremely well furnished, the bedrooms are beautiful with pillowy soft beds, and the living area is stunning and comfortable around the fireplace. And the view from the living/ dining area is spectacular!
We all thoroughly enjoyed our time relaxing in this space, walking the land, and visiting Pisgah National Forest, Biltmore, and Brevard.
Jackie is one of the best hosts I've stayed with, hands down -- quick response times, excellent communication, and wonderful hospitality. I hope to stay here again!
Warmest wishes for a joyful holiday!
Kirsten

Great house in a great location. Very close to all that downtown Brevard has to offer and a short drive to Dupont Forest trailheads. Super clean and serene environment. Our favorite dinner spot is Square Root and we discovered an amazing new breakfast place - Cedar Mountain Cafe - a can’t miss…12 minute drive from the cabin. We can’t wait to return!

Jackie was a wonderful host, and the house was a perfect cabin getaway. My family had a wonderful time, and we got a lot of good use out of the kitchen, which had everything you could need. Would definitely come back again!

If you want the best of both worlds--close to downtown, but also private, quiet, with a spectacular view--this is the place to be. We were so impressed with the location and we are definitely going to stay here again.
Great, clean place. Lot's of living space, and a unique location close to Brevard. It's very new feeling!
Jackie is a great host. She took care of all the details and made sure we had everything to help us feel right at home.
Everything was perfect! Jackie was quick to provide responses, house was very clean and she even had a Christmas tree set up! Loved our trip!

Gorgeous cabin with very cozy touches. Jackie was very professional and thoughtful. It was my birthday weekend and she left me chocolates! Our group of friends had a lovely time staying in the cabin in the evenings and venturing out to the nearby hiking areas during the day. Overall outstanding!
Very Clean, well stocked home.

This cabin was the perfect cozy getaway for four adults and two children! It is very clean, nicely decorated, well stocked with all the basic amenities you’d need, and good location to drive to many of the area’s trails and waterfalls. We enjoyed cooking our meals in the kitchen, and at nighttime standing on the balcony looking up at the stars — such clear skies! What a wonderful, restful weekend we had — we already can’t wait to be back.
Perfect in every aspect. 45 minute drive to Biltmore and numeous day trips to national park and surrounding areas. Downtown Brevard is great

We had the most amazing time at Jackie's French Broad Cabin. It's in the most convenient location for exploring Brevard, Pisgah, DuPont, and Asheville. The cabin is so beautiful and cozy. We didn't need for anything. Everything was immaculately clean and smelled so nice. There was plenty of space for our family. The kids loved the loft area. It took us maybe 7 minutes to get into town. (We saw so many white squirrels!) We hiked every day and the cabin was the most relaxing place to return "home" to. Jackie was a wonderful host, always quick to respond and check in on us. We had the best time. I will absolutely check to see if their cabin is available first the next time we visit Brevard (which I hope will be soon)!
This is our third visit. It is our favorite place in Brevard. It is in the perfect location to see everything. It is very comfortable, clean, and attractive.
This cabin is a great getaway to the mountains. The place was extremely clean and all needed items provided. The host was great and the property was even better than expected!
A beautiful cabin in the mountains. Great location close to town and trails for hiking! Wonderful amenities! Will definitely come back!
Jackie’s place was extremely clean and cozy! Perfect for a little getaway. Communication was prompt and appreciated!

We had a wonderful stay at the cabin! It was perfect for our family of 5. The cabin was spotless when we arrived. Jackie was so helpful with local spots to eat and hike. She even left candy for my kiddos!
Amazing cabin with very thoughtful hosts! Clean, spacious with thoughtful touches!

This cabin was everything we wanted and needed. It is located about a 5-minute drive from the "downtown" Brevard area and everything was easily accessible but it still feels like you're secluded. The views from the cabin are hard to beat. We had several nights where we could clearly see every star in the sky from the balcony. Everything was super clean and we had everything we needed to cook a few meals at the cabin. We did a fair amount of hiking so it was nice that there was a brand new washer and dryer to use to wash our hiking clothes! The beds were very comfortable and the bathrooms were decently sized. Jackie was very quick to respond and communicate directions to the cabin. We already can't wait to come back!
This place was amazing! Very clean, short drive into town, and great amenities. Jackie truly went above and beyond and far exceeded our expectations. We will definitely be staying there again!
